title: We need a pink ward slot. Need. And other stuff.
body:
I realize games are usually FF@20 now, but lets say, hypothetically, a game went long.  So long, in fact, that players were reaching full build.  Or even just "need every slot but not quite complete items" build.

At that point in the game, pink wards no longer exist.  It's like a timer.  Used to be, one or two people could upgrade their trinket and have a pink available to help with (insert reason to see invis champs here).  Heck, even sweeper could be used in a fight.  But now?  Now all invisible champions/abilities have a new hidden power:  They become undetectable late-game.

There is a simple solution, of course:  Item slot #8:  Ward Slot.  If you feel that a slot just to hold pink wards is a bad idea, then you could do one of these things:

1. Reinstate green wards since, PLEASE REINSTATE GREEN WARDS. Then the slot could hold pink or green.
2. Allow the slot to hold any of these: {{item:2043}} {{item:2049}} {{item:2045}} 
3. Give us the ability to make the Vision Ward upgrade trinket again, so we could choose between:  {{item:3362}} {{item:3340}} {{item:3363}} {{item:3341}} {{item:3364}} 

On a very related note, there is a reason to keep {{item:3340}} over {{item:3363}} -- you can teleport to the wards, and they are harder to destroy.  However, there is no reason to keep {{item:3341}} over {{item:3364}}.  I mean, would you like to detect a much smaller area for a shorter duration, or would you like to pay exactly nothing and detect a huge area that moves with you and lasts 50% longer?  The choice is yours!  Why not make the un-upgraded one actually useful.  For instance, it could fully reveal invisible units in the area?  It's duration could increase with level to be even longer than the oracle upgrade (since it is stationary).  It's cooldown could be dramatically reduced.

TLDR:  The vision situation sucks right now.  Please do something to help alleviate it.

But its part of league its a mechanic. Knowledge it half your game. Saying Vision is too OP and should cost high levels of gold and an item slot is like saying the Queen in chess should only be allowed if you got a pawn all the way to the other side. Yes its very powerful but its a key part of the game. If you don't want to put up with vision don't play league. Play Dawn of War or Starcraft, wards aren't a problem there.

And you get a trinket that drops free wards. You have your vision, and you have the option (OPTION) to spend 75 gold and a temporary inventory spot for a permanent invis seeing ward. If these wards were given their own slot stealth champions would become impossible to play, which in all honesty is probably the real reason for this thread. It is part of league, and as it stands now its fine.

Vision is so weak now and you really can't depend on people in solo queue to ward for you (not even supports, but sometimes people are smart enough to ward). Yellow trinkets have HUGE cd's and blues are too obvious and easy to deal with. Not only are they visible and get 1-shot but for some reason when you put them down they create a massive visual effect for your enemies to see.

I liked the system even in season 5. You could buy your own wards and you didn't have to depend on other people to see more than a tiny quarter of the map.

You got a support( And mid lane) Knife that launches ghosts thats extremely popular right now that prevents invisible champs from going invisible. You have the ability to HOLD ONTO your pink ward before a fight and drop it to reveal invisible champions. Numerous abilities can strike and reveal invisible champions. Any of these champions (Except lee sin lol), if you strip away their ability to be invisible become worthless. If two people on your team take sweeper you can essentially make any game with a stealth champion a 5v4. Stop whining about invis champs and use the tools you have at your disposal to counter them.

I enjoy stealth champions, but that doesn't mean i think the champions i play should have zero counters especially late game when nobody has a slot for pinks left, i actually think a lot of stealth champions should have built in counter measures to their kit like eve does, heck vayne could have something where the person she is autoing can see her while invisible but nobody else can.
Lee Sin, high invisibility champion... Everyone is invisible to him, not the other way around. Seriously though, unupgraded red needs a buff.

The base red trinket has a cast range. This is relevant when you simply want to disable a ward, not kill it (usually when the enemy team is trying to steal Baron or dragon and you're nowhere near the ward).

The vision situation REALLY DOES SUCK right now. I really want more wards. I'm sick of being ganked by a jungler then not even having the option to buy wards to protect myself because they don't exist.

I upgraded my trinket in s5 RELIGIOUSLY.  I felt like a noob if I didn't, and I felt like it was part of what made me a better player than others.

But as far as the reasons behind them nerfing vision, it's because 1) the LCS was boring.  No one wants to watch 40 minutes of ward clearing.  2) they wanted games to be faster.  This forces us to face check when we know it's a bad idea, so the games go faster because there are more catches.

I miss being able to place meaningful wards and have a choice on how I wanted to spend my trinket slot, whether that be getting true sight for my team or getting more vision.  The wards now that all last 1 minute unless they're from the green smite or a sightstone don't feel very important.  What's the point of warding Baron for 1 minute, they can just do it after one minute.  Yeah I spent a lot of money on wards, but at least they felt important, unlike the cheaper wards now.

Kind of feels like they've been trying to make the game easier for noobs (and consequently making there less of a skill ceiling and providing less room for improvement) over the course of last season and this preseason.

A "pink ward slot" is a bad idea, because it's the reason why trinket existed at first... So just bring back pink ward trinket / sweeper.

This isn't a good idea. And before you downvote, im not being negative im just thinking statistics. Sightstone is a full item because of the other stats it gives, and had a build path etc.  If there was a slot for this, everyone would be able to have a sightstone on top of their build, causing there to be too much vision, as weird as that sounds. They other problem is that if there was an extra slot for pink wards, near everyone would have a pink ward on them right? Doesnt take up slots so its a good Idea, isnt it? Problem is, then champions like Rengar, Kha, Akali, and Shaco have some if not half of their kits invalidated. Everyone has a pink on hand means that shaco is near useless except for head on fighting, because his q is now only a small blink compared to his outplay potential as soon has someone pops a ward. The red trinket is balanced well, and is supposed to give vision in a small area so that you are away of location without being able to actually target them. I'm not against pink wards, they're amazing, but this would pose some problems on too many other subjects for it to be worth implementing.
